name: Suggestion, Mass
description: This spell functions like suggestion, except that it can affect more creatures. The same suggestion applies to all these creatures.
target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

name: Overwhelm
description: You grip the creature's head, and a surge of magical energy overwhelms its senses. With a touch, you deal nonlethal damage to the subject equal to the creature's current hit point total.
